It offers cross-platform compilation, automatic differentiation, a module system, and generics, enabling developers to write shaders once and run them on multiple platforms like D3D12, Vulkan, and CUDA. Slang also provides compatibility with HLSL and GLSL, facilitating easier adoption for existing projects.
